Package br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.exceptions

package br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.exceptions
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    AttributeNotFoundException
    Exceção lançada quando um atributo de perfil não está preenchido.
    CrushAlreadyAdded
    Exception thrown when a user tries to add a crush that is already in their crush list.
    CrushOfItself
    Exception thrown when a user tries to add themselves as their own crush.
    EnemyAlreadyAdded
    Exception thrown when a user tries to add an enemy that is already in their enemy list.
    EnemyException
    Exception thrown when a user tries to establish a relationship with someone who has them as an enemy.
    EnemyOfItself
    Exception thrown when a user tries to add themselves as their own enemy.
    FanOfItself
    Exception thrown when a user tries to add themselves as their own idol.
    IdolAlreadyAdded
    Exception thrown when a user tries to add an idol that is already in their idol list.
    InvalidAuthException
     
    InvalidCommunityException
    Exceção lançada quando ocorre um erro relacionado a operações com comunidades.
    InvalidFriendOpException
    Exception thrown when an invalid friend operation is attempted.
    InvalidRelationshipException
     
    NotFilledAttributeException
     
    NotFoundMessageException
    Exceção lançada quando não há mensagens para ler.
    NotFoundUserException
    Exceção lançada quando um usuário não é encontrado no sistema.
    RelationshipException
    General exception for relationship-related errors.
    SelfMessageException
     
    SystemOperationException
     
    UserAlreadyExistsException
     
    UserExistsException
    Exceção lançada quando se tenta criar um usuário com um login que já existe.
